about_description: I'm Cüneyt Öztürk, a passionate software developer who builds end-to-end solutions with a strong interest in web technologies. On the frontend, I develop user-centric interfaces using modern tools like React, Angular, and TailwindCSS. On the backend, I write reliable and scalable services with Spring Boot and Node.js. I work with database technologies like Oracle SQL and PL/SQL to build data-driven systems on solid foundations. In every project, I prioritize code quality, performance, and user experience. I constantly strive to learn new technologies and improve myself with an open mindset.
hero_description: As a Full-stack Developer, I build user-friendly interfaces, reliable web services, and performance-oriented backend systems. I also conduct efficiency improvements in SQL queries and database operations.
contact_description: You can use the addresses below to contact me or send an email directly.
